ComicInfo.Summary:
Celebrating 750 ISSUES of the INCREDIBLE H%LK™! Something is wrong. Something has compromised the simulacrum.
EXTRA-SIZE HULK-SM&SHING ACTION™! Banner is refusing to yield. Something is wrong.
PL#S! ENTER - THE THOUGHTFUL MAN! Something is wrong. Something is wrong. Something is wrong.
